text: No matter the outcome in November, the world's stability hangs in the balance. With concerns over Western hegemony on the rise, we must prioritize strong leadership and unwavering commitment to our allies.Trump's stance on NATO has sparked anxiety across Europe, leaving Italy and Spain questioning our reliability as a partner. Meanwhile, Putin's warnings only serve to heighten tensions.As hotspots like Gaza and Ukraine continue to simmer, the threat of global conflict looms large. We must remain vigilant and steadfast in upholding our values and defending our interests. The world needs strong leadership now more than ever.
